title: [Old Manor, Living Room]
description: Passing between the charred and blackened pillars of a once graceful marble archway, you feel a sense of unease touch your very soul.  Muted moonlight trickles between the tumbled remains of this once elegant foyer, outlining scorched and broken boards and rafters.
